"use strict";
 
var fluid = require("infusion"),
    gpii = fluid.registerNamespace("gpii"),
    uuid = require("node-uuid");
 
require("kettle");
 
fluid.defaults("gpii.rawPreferencesServer", {
    gradeNames: ["kettle.app"],
    requestHandlers: {
        rawPreferencesGet: {
            route: "/rawPreferences/:userToken",
            method: "get",
            type: "gpii.rawPreferencesServer.get.handler"
        },
        rawPreferencesPost: {
            route: "/rawPreferences",
            method: "post",
            type: "gpii.rawPreferencesServer.write.handler"
        },
        rawPreferencesPut: {
            route: "/rawPreferences/:userToken",
            method: "put",
            type: "gpii.rawPreferencesServer.write.handler"
        }
    },
    components: {
        rawPreferencesDataSource: {
            type: "kettle.dataSource", // overriden by concrete grades
            options: {
                writable: true,
                notFoundIsEmpty: true,
                termMap: {
                    userToken: "%userToken"
                }
            }
        }
    }
});
 
fluid.defaults("gpii.rawPreferencesServer.handlerBase", {
    gradeNames: "kettle.request.http",
    requestMiddleware: {
        CORS: {
            middleware: "{middlewareHolder}.CORS"
        }
    }
});
 
 
gpii.rawPreferencesServer.handlePreferences = function (request, userToken, preferences) {
    Iif (preferences && preferences.isError) { // preferences are NOT expected on PUT/POST
        request.events.onError.fire(preferences);
    } else {
        var data = {
            userToken: userToken,
            preferences: preferences
        };
 
        request.events.onSuccess.fire(data);
    }
};
 
fluid.defaults("gpii.rawPreferencesServer.get.handler", {
    gradeNames: "gpii.rawPreferencesServer.handlerBase",
    invokers: {
        handleRequest: {
            funcName: "gpii.handleRawPreferencesGet",
            args: [ "{request}", "{request}.req.params.userToken", "{rawPreferencesServer}.rawPreferencesDataSource"]
        }
    }
});
 
 
gpii.handleRawPreferencesGet = function (request, userToken, rawPreferencesDataSource) {
    var promise = rawPreferencesDataSource.get({userToken: userToken});
    promise.then(function (preferences) {
        if (preferences === undefined) {
            request.events.onError.fire({
                isError: true,
                message: "Raw preferences server: Preferences missing for user " + userToken,
                statusCode: 404
            });
            return;
        }
        gpii.rawPreferencesServer.handlePreferences(request, userToken, preferences);
    }, function (err) {
        request.events.onError.fire({
            isError: true,
            message: "Raw preferences server: Unable to retrieve preferences from raw preferences source: " + err.message,
            statusCode: 500
        });
    });
};
 
 
fluid.defaults("gpii.rawPreferencesServer.write.handler", {
    gradeNames: "gpii.rawPreferencesServer.handlerBase",
    invokers: {
        handleRequest: {
            funcName: "gpii.rawPreferencesServer.write.handleRequest",
            args: [ "{request}", "{rawPreferencesServer}.rawPreferencesDataSource"]
        }
    }
});
 
gpii.rawPreferencesServer.write.handleRequest = function (request, rawPreferencesDataSource) {
    var userToken = request.req.params.userToken || uuid.v4();
    rawPreferencesDataSource.set({
        userToken: userToken
    }, request.req.body, function () {
        gpii.rawPreferencesServer.handlePreferences(request, userToken, request.req.body);
    });
};
